item.title: Research
item.description: 2021 Ruixiang Cui, Rahul Aralikatte, Heather Lent, Daniel Hershcovich. Multilingual Compositional Wikidata Questions . arXiv. Ruixiang Cui, Daniel Hershcovich. Great Service! Fine-grained Parsing of Implicit Arguments. International Conference on Parsing Technologies (IWPT). Ruixiang Cui, Daniel Hershcovich. Meaning Representation of Numeric Fused-Heads in UCCA. ACL Workshop on Understanding Implicit and Underspecified Language. 2020 Ruixiang Cui. Refining and Parsing Implicit Argument in Universal Conceptual Cognitive Annotation. Master’s thesis. Ruixiang Cui, Daniel Hershcovich. Refining Implicit Argument Annotation for UCCA.
